list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "interface")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["tag"])
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
list.label: FW_Interface
list.name: iface
list.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "interface")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["tag"])
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
